name: Fountain of Life
description:
Controls

  • Move: w a s d (up, left, down, right)
  • Roll: Space Bar
  • Attack: Left click
  • Skill Attack: Right click 
  • Change Skill: Press 1, 2 or 3 to select skill
  • Drink Potions: R for HP   /  T for MP
  • Aim Skill: Mouse pointer

Game

Fight evil enemies that want to take over the Fountain of Life! You are attached to the fountain, so everytime that an enemy reaches it, you lose life.  Game is sort of a Tower Defense but instead of towers you use the main character to defend the fountain. 

Theme

Used the theme of the jam, change, so in this game you have several things such as different skills to choose from, different enemies with varying difficulties, waves or rounds and items to help you, which contribute to changes within the game. 

Comments

Game built in about 30 working hours.  This is my first game, will be used in My First Game Jam: Summer 2020. Credits to all the assets owners.
